product_name: Julbo MonteBianco Zebra Glacier Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: The Julbo MonteBianco Zebra sunglasses with photochromic lenses can be worn in low to extreme light, on the glacier and on the trail for protection in any condition. Zebra(R) photochromic NXT lenses respond quickly to changing light conditions, darken in bright light and lighten in dim light. NXT polyurethane lens material provides exceptional optical clarity and visual comfort. Extremely flexible and impact-resistant, NXT lenses are guaranteed not to break or crack. NXT lenses feature a long-lasting antifog coating that stops condensation from forming on lens surfaces. Lightweight, tough nylon frames feature flexible temples that allow sunglasses to fit various face shapes naturally. Grippy inserts at ear stem ends become tacky as you perspire, holding eyewear in place during strenuous activity; does not stick to hair. Side shields block light coming from the sides; can be removed as needed. Julbo MonteBianco sunglasses include a protective case for storage.
short_description: The Julbo MonteBianco Zebra sunglasses with photochromic lenses can be worn in low to extreme light, on the glacier and on the trail for protection in any condition.
